ch0658_00_karen/0101_0701_01_10:
You’re late, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been
waiting for you!
ch0658_00_karen/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s swing our arms and get going! That way, our
clothes will flutter and we’ll look cute!
ch0658_00_karen/7101_0701_01_10:
The students at Laverre Gym are teammates who
are aiming for the same goals, but they’re also my
rivals.
ch0658_00_karen/7101_0701_02_10: Well, that’s what I think, at least...
ch0658_00_karen/7101_0701_03_10:
It would be nice if everyone else felt the
same, too.
ch0658_00_karen/7105_0701_03_10:
It’s just that when I look at you, I feel like I’m
being healed!
ch0658_00_karen/1701_0701_02_10: I have something I want to give to you.
ch0658_00_karen/1701_0702_01_10: You better use this and win! Promise me!
ch0658_00_karen/2501_0701_01_10:
What opponents are the fairies we love good
against? I think you know the answer...
ch0658_00_karen/2501_0701_03_10:
That’s why I definitely can’t lose to a
Dragon-type user!
ch0658_00_karen/2501_0702_01_10: There are opponents that fairies struggle with...
ch0658_00_karen/2501_0702_02_10:
But just because they struggle doesn’t mean we’ll
run away!
ch0658_00_karen/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! The secret to my beauty is my
healthy lifestyle!
ch0658_00_karen/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m brainstorming with the others to create a new
furisode design!
ch0658_00_karen/3005_0701_01_10:
Fairies dancing in the moonlight... Such a magical
scene takes my breath away!
